name: Zombie Olé
storyline:
She has a dream: to be a famous soccer player.

But the zombies came, and so the world as we know it is gone and also her dream.

"NO! Brother, go to the top of that building and film me! I'll leave a video to the future! I'll be known as the greatest dribbler of all time!"

"I'll dribble the zombies until the end!"
summary: Zombie Olé is a game about a girl named Yara who wants to be a soccer player, but the world is plagued with zombies. With the help of her brother and his camera, she will try to become the greatest player of all time and dribble the zombies until the end!
